data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Ye, Qin, Dao-Zheng, Dietrich, Christopher H. (2019): A new genus and species, Barbaropus flatus, from Ecuador with notes on Empoascini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae).
